abstract: Joseph C Meek Jr pleads guilty to lying to federal officials and withholding information about involvement of his friend Dylann S Roof in 2015 church massacre in Charleston, SC.

headline.print_headline: Friend Admits Lies Linked to Suspect in Charleston
headline.main: Friend of Dylann Roof Pleads Guilty in Charleston Case

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Joseph C. Meek Jr. pleaded guilty on Friday to withholding his knowledge of Dylann S. Roof’s involvement in the attack on a Charleston church last June.
lead_paragraph: Joseph C. Meek Jr. pleaded guilty on Friday to withholding his knowledge of Dylann S. Roof’s involvement in the attack on a Charleston church last June.
